scripts.start: npm run watch & npm run livereload & npm run connect
scripts.watch: watch 'npm run mustache' src/views & watchify src/js/index.js -d -o public/app.js -t [ babelify ] -v & npm run sass -- -w src/sass
scripts.build:dev: npm run browserify src/js/index.js -d -o public/app.js -t [ babelify ] -v && npm run sass && npm run mustache
scripts.build: npm run build:dev && npm run minify && npm run mini:add
scripts.minify: uglifyjs public/app.js -o public/app.min.js && minify public/app.css -o public/app.min.css
scripts.mustache: find src/views/partials -name '*.mustache' | xargs -I {} echo '-p' {} ' ' | xargs -I {} sh -c 'eval mustache {} package.json src/views/index.mustache > public/index.html'
scripts.preview:push: npm version minor && npm run preview:mkdir && npm run preview:scp && npm run preview:open
scripts.preview:push:patch: npm version patch && npm run preview:mkdir && npm run preview:scp && npm run preview:open
scripts.stage:push: npm run stage:mkdir && npm run stage:scp && npm run stage:open
scripts.stage:commit: npm run stage:connect -- 'cd /var/www/interactives && git add $npm_package_config_stageDir/$npm_package_name && git commit -m "$npm_package_name v$npm_package_version" -q'

meta.title: Do you live in a Child Care Desert?
meta.description: A new report from the Center for American Progress has found that nearly half of the ZIP codes in 8 states are ‘Child Care Deserts.’ Enter your ZIP code to see whether you live in one of these Child Care Deserts.
